blocks.text:
Be careful with attachment , not gonna be scared
of it, though it teaches what armor you need to put on. maybe dont need armor could be a berserker style. I feel good now that i can write things down. Dani texted me she wants to pick up her random shirt stuff which i find unnecessary. ill have grandma verr hand it off maybe.. cant risk falling back in drod. but deep down i love the idea of us together. im not gonna feel bad anymore though I want to make the best creations. slug said theres love in the stories thats helped me get through this. Im starting to feel really full of gratitude all of a sudden. like a passed one of gods trials.
